item.title: about me
item.description: Thanks for stopping by! I am currently a data scientist at the Commercial Operations Division of AC Energy Philippines where I create and deploy market forecasting models and provide weather/climate insights for power trading. Prior to that, I trained for 6 years as a climate scientist and earned my masters in Atmospheric Science from Ateneo de Manila University last 2019. My topics of interest include regional monsoon dynamics, data validation techniques and climate model evaluation.

item.title: my works
item.description: An overview of my publications along with citation metrics can also be found on my Google Scholar profile. Published Works Peralta J.C.A.C., Narisma G.T., and Cruz F.T. Validation of High-Resolution Gridded Rainfall Datasets for Climate Applications in the Philippines, Journal of Hydrometeorology 21, 7 (2020): 1571-1587, accessed Dec 30, 2020, https://doi.org/10.1175/JHM-D-19-0276.1 Peralta J.A., Lim M., and Reyes R., Transportation network efficiency during disaster events, Proceedings of the Samahang Pisika ng Pilipinas 38, SPP-2020-3C-07 (2020) https://proceedings.
